tool_description:
Get Details aboat players, champions, and more!

Check the About page for details on every API!
name: League Of Legends Galore
title: League Of Legends Galore

api_list.name: Get Player Details
api_list.description:
Get Player Details based on UserName.
Case Sensitive!

api_list.name: Get Random Champion
api_list.description: This will go through the list of champions and return a single RANDOM champion!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-galore.p.rapidapi.com/api/randomChamp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-galore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Champion Tier List
api_list.description: Get either a list of the current champion tier list or a tier list section based on YOUR request!

api_list.name: Get All League Ranks
api_list.description: Get League of Legends ranks and their player base!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-galore.p.rapidapi.com/api/getLoLRanks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-galore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search For A Champion
api_list.description: This will go through the list of champions and return a single champion or a list of champions depending on YOUR request!

api_list.name: Get Random Item
api_list.description: This will go through the list of items and return a single RANDOM item!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-galore.p.rapidapi.com/api/randomItem"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-galore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search For A Item
